section.title: Deleting a Report
section.para: Delete reports when you find that they are no longer useful. Only administrators and super administrators of CloudForms Management Engine can add, copy, edit, and delete reports. Note that only customer created reports can be deleted.

step.para: Click the Reports accordion and select the report you want to delete.

Click
(Configuration),
(Delete this Report from the Database).

note.para: The Delete this report from the Database option will only appear on reports you have created. Default reports cannot be deleted.
